column2: License for Manufacturer/ Dealer/ Repair of Weighing & Measuring Instrument

column4: To Manufacture, Sale or Repair Weight/ Measure or Weighing & Measuring Instrument

Legal Metrology Act, 2009 ( Section 23)
M.P. Legal Metrology Rules, 2011 ( Rule 9(1))
column7: 1 Year, thereafter renewable up to 5 Years in one go
column11: Controller, Weight and Measures ( Legal Metrology)
column13: For manufacturing of Weight & Measures an approval of Model of Weight & Measure from Govt. of India, Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution ( Department of Consumer Affairs) is necessary

column3: Food, Civil Supplies and Consumer Protection Department
column5: Following 5 documents are to be uploaded along with the application form : 1.Fitness-cum-completion certificate issued by an Engineer not below the rank of Asst. Engineer working as employee of Government or Public Undertaking or Local body. 2. Chalan of license fee @ 50 paise per MT. 3. Self declartion certificate regarding all the information and document being correct. 4. Document of insurance policy. 5.Sample grader license issued by district supply controller/ officer.
column6: Section 3 of M.P. Warehousing Act, 1947 and Rule 4 of MP Agriculture Warehouse rule,1961
column10: Generally, if all the 5 required documents are uploaded along with application from license is issued within 7 working days from the date of receiving of application
column11: Commissioner, Food, Civil Supply & Consumer Protection
